tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_engagement (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    likes INT,
    shares INT,
    comments INT,
    sentiment_analysis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 followers_count INT,
 posts_count INT,
 engagement_score FLOAT)

CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id INT,
 post_content TEXT,
 likes_count INT,
 shares_count INT,
 comments_count INT,
 sentiment_analysis TEXT)

CREATE TABLE marketing_content (content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 description TEXT,
 creation_date DATE,
 author VARCHAR(50),
 status VARCHAR(20))

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 campaign_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE,
 budget DECIMAL,
 target_audience VARCHAR(100)}

CREATE TABLE social_media_engagement (
    post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    likes INT,
    shares INT,
    comments INT
)

CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis (
    post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    positive_keywords TEXT[],
    negative_keywords TEXT[]
)

CREATE TABLE marketing_content (
    content_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    content_text TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_engagement (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    total_likes INT,
    total_comments INT,
    total_shares INT
)

CREATE TABLE trending_topics (
    topic_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    topic_name TEXT,
    trend_score FLOAT,
    trending_date DATE
)
